features.name: Box OAuth Authentication
features.description: Handles OAuth2 authentication flow with Box.com, including authorization code exchange and token refresh.
test_scenarios: Exchange authorization code for access token
Validate client ID and client secret
Test with HTTPS and HTTP connections

features.name: Multiple Box Account Mappings
features.description: Supports connecting multiple Box accounts to a single portal with different folder mappings.
test_scenarios: List all Box connections for portal
Delete Box connection and cleanup folders
Test folder mapping with custom parent folder

features.name: Box Connector Configuration
features.description: Manages Box connector settings including client credentials, parent folder selection, and connection status.
test_scenarios: Save Box client ID and secret (encrypted)

features.name: File Upload to Box
features.description: Uploads files from DNN to Box cloud storage with automatic sharing link creation.
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Upload to Box Folder
test_scenarios: Upload single file to Box root folder
Upload file to specific Box subfolder
Upload file with special characters in name

features.name: File Download from Box
features.description: Downloads and streams files from Box storage to DNN users.
test_scenarios: Handle expired access tokens during download

features.name: File Operations Management
features.description: Manages file operations including copy, move, rename, and delete for Box files.
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Box Files > Context Menu
test_scenarios: Copy file to folder with existing file of same name

features.name: Folder Operations Management
features.description: Manages folder operations including create, move, rename, and delete for Box folders.
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Box Folders > Context Menu

features.name: Box Folder Browsing API
features.description: Provides API endpoints to browse and list Box folders for configuration and file management.
test_scenarios: Get all folders from Box account
Get folders with temporary mapping ID
Test folder listing with large folder structures
Get folder mapping ID for portal

features.name: Direct File Linking
features.description: Generates and manages direct download links for Box files with configurable sharing permissions.
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Box Files > Get Link
test_scenarios: Generate direct download link for file
Create share link with open access
Use existing share link if available

features.name: Box Object Caching
features.description: Caches Box file and folder metadata to improve performance and reduce API calls.
test_scenarios: Cache folder listing on first access
Test cache with multiple folder mappings
Test cache performance with large datasets

features.name: File Hash/Checksum Verification
features.description: Retrieves and verifies file checksums (SHA1) from Box for integrity verification.
test_scenarios: Get SHA1 hash for Box file
Compare local and remote file hashes

features.name: Token Refresh Management
features.description: Automatically refreshes expired Box access tokens using refresh tokens.
test_scenarios: Store new access and refresh tokens
Test token refresh with multiple mappings

features.name: Folder Synchronization
features.description: Synchronizes folder structure between DNN and Box, including cleanup of orphaned folders.
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Synchronize Box Folders
test_scenarios: Initial folder structure sync from Box
Update local folders when Box changes
Delete local folders when Box mapping removed
